title: Bahamas Day Pass Expands Its Shore Excursion Offerings in Nassau and Adds FreeportTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Bahamas Day Pass Expands Its Shore Excursion Offerings in Nassau and Adds Freeport Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
Bahamas Day Pass, the official distributor of resort day-pass shore excursions and an affiliated partner of Atlantis, Paradise Island’s Marine and Water Park Division, announced today that it has added two more products to it resort day pass offerings — Breezes Resort & Spa Bahamas in Nassau and Viva Wyndham Fortuna Beach resort in Freeport.
Cruisers longing for a relaxing day in Nassau can now purchase a resort-day pass to Breezes Resort & Spa Bahamas, an all-inclusive resort located on the world-famous Cable Beach. In addition to beach access and land and water activities, this resort features three freshwater pools including a swim-up pool bar, main pool and misting pool, plus a poolside Jacuzzi. This all-inclusive resort day pass includes dining at an array of buffets and outdoor grills as well as premium cocktails and exotic tropical concoctions.
Cruise passengers visiting Freeport will find a 1,200-foot stretch of soft, white sand beach with top-notch snorkeling in one of the world’s largest reef systems just off shore at Viva Wyndham Fortuna Beach all-inclusive resort. Choose from an array of land and water sports or just relax in style by the 120-by-50-foot pool surrounded by a spacious sundeck, lounge chairs and umbrella tables. This all-inclusive resort day pass includes Viva Wyndham Kid’s Retreat for children and teens; breakfast, lunch and snacks all day along with unlimited refreshing beverages and cocktails.
“Our travel agent partners are excited about having a resort day pass shore excursion option for their cruise clients that they can earn commission on and book in advance,” said Sean Tolkin, business development director for World Travel Holdings. “We are happy to be able to increase our offerings by adding these new resorts in two of the most popular ports in the Bahamas, and the fact that they are all-inclusive provides an even greater value.”
Bahamas Day Pass most popular resort day pass offering continues to be the Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark and Atlantis Dolphin Cay in Nassau. As the official partner of Atlantis, Paradise Island’s Marine and Water Park Division, Bahamas Day Pass offers the opportunity for cruise passengers to purchase Atlantis Day Passes in advance.
Travel agents selling cruise vacations to clients visiting the Bahamas can earn commission on every Bahamas Day Pass sold. Once a travel agent account has been activated, agents will receive a welcome packet including information, instructions, quick facts and a unique Bahamas Day Pass URL for the travel agency. The unique URL records all sales and click-throughs. Learn more about the travel agent program.
